text: Sinovac Biotech Ltd. (, ) is a Chinese biopharmaceutical company. They focus on the research, creation and selling of vaccines that protect against human infectious diseases. The company is based in Haidian District, Beijing in China. \- Chinese address : "地址：北京市海淀区上地西路39号北大生物城" ==References== Category:Companies based in Beijing Category:Biotechnology companies Category:Pharmaceutical companies Category:Technology companies of the People's Republic of China
title: Sinovac Biotech
